verbs.description: [ARG0: ryanair] [V: closes] [ARG1: eindhoven base in netherlands] [ARGM-ADV: jobs uncertain] amsterdam nov 5- ryanair has closed its base in eindhoven the netherlands local media and unions reported on monday with more than a dozen dutch cabin workers dismissed and a standoff set to continue with pilots and other cabin staff who refused to relocate the airline which last week repeated it intended to close the base could not immediately be reached for netherlands europes ryanair eindhoven reuters germany amsterdam anp toby sterling
